We have heard many times how we should just download forms off the Internet to obtain the same civil rights as straight married couples.
 
 OK. For all those who said that, please point me to the IP address where I can download the form to get Ron ( a Philippino ) a US Immigration "green" card for resident alien, and eventual US citizenship based on the fact that we are a couple.
 
 DUH!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
 
 emoticon_rolleyes emoticon_rolleyes emoticon_rolleyes emoticon_rolleyes

post_info.post_title: Download form for equal protection under the law.

While your at it, could you please show me where Idownload the form that lets my partner and I inherit each other's belongings without mega taxes?
 
 and also that form that allows us sign up at the YMCA with the discounted family plan...instead od two strangers......
 
 I would also like the form that allows to register the car in both our names, in my state you can only register a car under two names if you are married.....so I need the magic form that corrects this issue.....
I have located a very important website. Please visit http://www.essene.org/Yahowshua_or_Paul.htm. I guarantee this site will help us defend ourselves against predjudice.

Not to mention the form that would guarantee me the right not to have my partner testify against me in a court of law.
 
 (Submitting these forms, should they exist, won't cost me any more than the average marriage license, will they? 'Cause if they did, that wouldn't be equality, would it?)

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Download form for equal protection under the law.
